name: Staff of Fire
details: Staff, very rare (requires attunement by a Druid, Sorcerer, Warlock, or Wizard)
description:
The staff has 10 charges.
While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC:
  - Burning Hands (1 charge)
  - Fireball (3 charges)
  - Wall of Fire (4 charges).

The staff regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dawn. If you expend the last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the staff blackens, crumbles into cinders, and is destroyed.

name: Staff of Stormclouds
details: Staff, rare (requires attunement by a spellcaster)
description:
This staff is used to cast the following spells. It has 10 maximum charges and regains 1d8+2 charges at dawn each day.

- Fog cloud (1 charge)
- Call lightning (2 charges)
- Control weather (3 charges)

When you use the last charge, roll a d20. On a 1 the staff disintegrates and turns to dust.

name: Widowmaker
details: Weapon (dagger), rare, finesse, light, thrown (20/60 ft.)
description:
**Adamantine**
Whenever this weapon hits an object, the hit is a Critical Hit.
**Returning**
This weapons returns to your hand immediately after you use it to make a ranged attack roll.
**Teleporting**
After throwing the dagger you may teleport to it as a bonus action, at any point in its trajectory. This ability recharges after a short rest.
